lead_paragraph: Prison buddies Ray and Pluto, and Ray's girlfriend Fantasia--all from L.A., committ a series of executions in Los Angeles before heading east to unload a cache of stolen cocaine--only only to be apprehended by a gung-ho sheriff in Louisiana.
snippet: Prison buddies Ray and Pluto, and Ray's girlfriend Fantasia--all from L.A., committ a series of executions in Los Angeles before heading east to unload a cache of stolen cocaine--only only to be apprehended by a gung-ho sheriff in Louisiana.
